CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Treatment Assessment stage positioned above or below the Initial Consultation stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Treatment Assessment stage is positioned {below} the Initial Consultation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Consultation?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Consultation is {4563}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed is {3383}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {4563}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-Treatment Assessment, with a value of {1203}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {634} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated?
SC.A: Decreased by {553} Patients from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Initiated to stage Treatment Completed?
SC.A: Decreased by {590} Patients from stage Treatment Initiated to stage Treatment Completed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 4290? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2550? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Initiated} stage has {2274}, the {Treatment Completed} stage has {1684}, the {Post-Treatment Assessment} stage has {1203}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2550 and 3105? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Recommended} to {Treatment Initiated} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Treatment Completed to Post-Treatment Assessment, from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, or from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Initiated} to stage {Treatment Completed} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to stage {Diagnosis Confirmed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Diagnostic Testing} and {Diagnosis Confirmed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Completed} and {Post-Treatment Assessment} stages.
